name: Modulars For You Kitchen
shortDescription: A specialized online kitchen planning tool allowing users to design, edit, and view modular kitchen layouts in 2D and 3D.
fullDescription:
Modulars For You Kitchen is a specialized design and planning tool that enables users to create their dream modular kitchen design effortlessly. The application offers various features for design customization, including creating new designs, loading existing designs via a shareable code, and utilizing pre-made templates.

Key Features:

  • 2D/3D Editor: Provides a canvas for drawing the room layout, setting dimensions, and viewing the design in both 2D and 3D.
  • Design Customization: Tools available for creating the room, adding design elements, and placing 'Furniture & Appliances'.
  • Real-Time Cost Tracking: Shows an estimated cost/price calculation in real-time as you design.
  • Save/Share Functionality: Designs can be easily saved and shared with others using unique codes.
